When your ship overheats, it makes just about any task not only more difficult, but potentially dangerous for you and your crew. With the entry-level HydroJet from Juno Starwerk installed, you can be confident that your heat levels are being controlled by a cooler designed by one of the most trustworthy names in the industry.
